description:
Hack For Good is looking not only for tech solutions but for the best tech solutions that participants can develop. With that in mind, the Warm Up program will be the perfect moment for participants to start thinking, in a structured way, how their ideas can become real solutions. 
The sessions will take place across the country, from North to South. Get on board and join us at your home location!
name: Hack For Good 2018 > Warm-Up Porto
